evidence.claim: Compirion uses AWS for cloud services to host their healthcare applications.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance in its healthcare solutions.
Compirion integrates with HL7 standards for seamless data exchange in healthcare.
Their platform is capable of FHIR-based interactions for health data.
Compirion implements RESTful APIs for accessing their healthcare data solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or EDI processes found.
